original_title: Amidst the Chaos – Live (Again) from the Hollywood Bowl
overview: Returning to the scene of the crime seemed to Sara Bareilles like a good way to promote her live album, “Amidst the Chaos: Live at the Hollywood Bowl,” and so the singer-songwriter will be boosting the release with a livestream return gig at the Bowl, albeit with about 17,500 fewer people in attendance than when the original concert was recorded.
title: Amidst the Chaos – Live (Again) from the Hollywood Bowl
